title: Ceiling fans in each bedroom, Faux-wood flooring, Recycling
posting_body: ['IDEALLY LOCATED APARTMENTS IN SANTA CRUZ', 'The Hilltop Santa Cruz offers 1 or 2 bedroom apartments for rent near Downtown and the University of California Santa Cruz.', "We're in the center of all things that make the Santa Cruz community unique and lovable.", "With tons of great amenities and a great selection of floor plans to choose from, you'll love calling our pet-friendly community home.", 'Enjoy our newly renovated floor plan and unit options with quartz countertops, faux wood flooring, modern kitchen appliances and plenty of storage.', 'At our apartments in Santa Cruz for rent, we simplify living and maximize convenience to make your life easy.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 61', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 657 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Ceiling fans in each bedroom', '- Faux-wood flooring', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Quartz countertops', '- Balconies or patios', '- Upgraded interiors and kitchens', '- Large closets with built-in organizers', 'Community Amenities', '- Spa', '- Free coffee bar', '- Recycling', '- On-site laundry', '- Covered parking', '- On-site laundry and management', '- Great location', '- BBQ grills', '- Sparkling pool', '- Pet-friendly community', '- Community lounge with free WiFi', '- Gorgeous ocean or canyon views', '- Central courtyard', '- Hammock garden', 'Pet Policy', 'The Hilltop is a pet friendly community!', 'No more than one animal is permitted in a bedroom and no more than two animals are permitted in an apartment.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:1:00PM-5:00PM', 'The Hilltop', '363 Western Dr, Santa Cruz, CA, 95060', '6c1wD2EHi']
